response.overview: A reflexive exploration of oneself through extensive production processes, ‘A JOURNEY TO CHRIST INSANE’ investigates themes of memory, existentialism, indeterminacy, birth and death, labour, and evolution. Through found footage, painted animation, data moshing, wildlife photography and process documentation, varied visual materials were developed and digitally augmented. These disparate materials were then converted into raw audio data. These images and their sonifications then served as the founding stimulus for a musical accompaniment, featuring acoustic instruments and sounds, field recordings, digital instrumentation, and effects.
response.title: A JOURNEY TO CHRIST INSANE
